levels.description:
Next attack's ATK increases to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</>; When this unit's HP is lower than <@ba.vup>{hp_ratio_double:0%}</>, this attack strikes <@ba.vup>1</> additional time; when lower than <@ba.vup>{hp_ratio_tripple:0%}</>, this attack strikes <@ba.vup>2</> additional times
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
